sections.title: Interview Preparation Overview
sections.content: Technical interviews for software engineering roles often focus on data structures, algorithms, and problem-solving. Preparation is key to success.

sections.title: Preparation Steps
sections.content:
• Review core data structures and algorithms
  • Practice LeetCode and similar platforms
  • Mock interviews
  • System design basics
  • Behavioral questions

sections.title: Tips for Success
sections.content:
• Communicate your thought process
  • Write clean, bug-free code
  • Test edge cases
  • Ask clarifying questions
  • Stay calm and positive
